data.description:
Toujours Dimanche brings nature to those who can’t access it.
Splurge into sunsets, take a break by the sea, explore a mountain ridge, or listen to crickets... Enjoy the beauty of nature as you will.

This multiplayer VR experience is destined for audiences of all ages, on Oculus Quest. There are may ways to enjoy our app. Either browse the sites gallery, explore a world map, or engage in a guided meditation. You can also either enjoy a contemplative beat, or explore areas in a more adventurous way. 

While appealing to travel and nature enthusiasts, Toujours Dimanche was developped in collaboration with health-care partners. It is designed especially for nursing homes, retirement homes & pallaitive care. It's safe, confortable and accessible. We take pride at creating useful immersive tools for health care professionals.

A non-VR versions for Mobile (iOS/Android) is also available and can be used to assist less-able, VR users. This way, anyone using a mobile device can become "the guide" and assist other users, for accessibility purpose.

Super Sublime is a non for profit organisation with a mission to alleviate pain and lift-up spirits through art & immersion. We created Toujours Dimanche with a goodwill intent. Becasue we think Nature is a basic need for anyone, no matter your priviledges of luck in life.
